name: Dwarven Depths (SteelGemGames)
description:
Designed for a 1080p Screen (other resolutions may not work as well)

Reccomend Download and run it, WebGL will work but its more stuttery.

You may need to Click the Screen to get movement working Correctly!

Game was Created for Ludum Dare 48

Take on the role of an unnamed Adventurer, Contacted by the voice of a stranger asking for your help. She will Guide you deeper and deeper into the depths of an ancient Dwarven Kingdom.


It is a First Person Puzzler. Only 2 (and a half) levels were created as a Submission to the Game Jam due to time constraints. If interest is shown in it, i will be sure to persue further levels.

I streamed the entirety of the making of this game to twitch. even had a couple of viewers!

Engine: Unity

Assets used:

  •  Synty Studios Dungeon Realms
  • Synty Studios Dungeons
  • https://syntystore.com/products/polygon-particle-fx-pack
  • Felfurion - padlock and key

AI Voices by: Speechelo

SoundEffects : 

  • Ancient Game Sound Effects
  • Home and Office SFX Pack Lite
  • Online Scary Voice Changer
  • Audacity for some slight edits to Voices and Effects
